attributes.action: Stop paying mp's until brexit is solved and we have left the eu
attributes.background: Mp's have shown time and time again they are incomptent and not worth the amount we pay them every month.  Any normal person if they didnt do their job right.  So stop paying mp their benefits and wages until they do what we pay them to do and get us out of europe.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
